brainly_data.question:
So for my Game Design class I have a quiz coming up...I was wondering if someone could answer some of these practice questions, since my teacher isn't here to help me...I need to get this done fast. Thanks for the help :)

Script Language is?
The programmer who creates or maintains the software framework that a video game is developed around is the?
Most digital marker places take 30 percent of the price of the download. True or false?
The artist who assigns motion to characters and other game objects is the?
In video game developement, the person responcible for designing and documenting the underlying systems or mechanics that define a game is the?
brainly_data.subject: Computers and technology

all_answers.question:
So for my Game Design class I have a quiz coming up...I was wondering if someone could answer some of these practice questions, since my teacher isn't here to help me...I need to get this done fast. Thanks for the help :)

Script Language is?
The programmer who creates or maintains the software framework that a video game is developed around is the?
Most digital marker places take 30 percent of the price of the download. True or false?
The artist who assigns motion to characters and other game objects is the?
In video game developement, the person responcible for designing and documenting the underlying systems or mechanics that define a game is the?
all_answers.subject: Computers and technology
all_answers.text:
1. A script or scripting language is a computer language with a series of commands within a file that is capable of being executed without being compiled.
2. Software development
3. true
4. im not sure
here is a sight that might help 
https://quizlet.com/150321269/video-game-design-terms-flash-cards/
